explanation: [0-0] In front of a brick wall, a transparent plastic bottle without a cap is clamped on a blue machine.

[7-10] Then the picture focuses on the broom head with the cut interface, a hand puts a blue bottle cap on the flat cut, you can see that there are two pre-prepared drilling holes on the bottle cap facing the screw holes on the broom head, then a blue screwdriver appears to drive a screw diagonally into the drilling hole of the bottle cap, and then use a screwdriver to turn another screw into the drilling hole.
